dict.acceptation: 准备好的，现成的；即时的，敏捷的；情愿的；即将的；

sent.orig: You know, however. that all our agents in this line are getting a READY% commission.
sent.trans: 但是。要知道。有的代理商都只拿READY%的佣金。

sent.orig: CPUs can also use the READY signal to synchronize data transfers with the memory subsystem.
sent.trans: CPU同样也可以使用READY信号来同步与存储器子系统之间的数据传输。

sent.orig: Be ready to smile! Be ready to help! Be ready to serve!
sent.trans: 准备好微笑！准备好帮助！准备好服务。

sent.orig: Camera-ready artwork: Artwork or paste-up that is ready for reprophotography. See Artwork. Also called Camera-ready copy.
sent.trans: 正稿：作复制照相用的评述稿或拼贴。

sent.orig: We're ready to go, please get ready and release the hand brake.
sent.trans: 我们要出发了，请你准备好，放下手闸。
